wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Nicholas Lindsay Wood (March 29, 1875 – June 1, 1939) was an English sailor who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics representing Great Britain. He was a crew member of the British boat Cobweb, which won the gold medal in the 8 metre class.
